Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I've painted many landscapes in my life...<sp:5:0:0>
but that<clr:0000> tiny island <clr:ffff>floating in the distance
may be the most mysterious of all.
Who put that strange little island up
there? <sp:5:1:0>It's a fascinating shape. Easy to
paint too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You should go see it for yourself <clr:0000>once
the weather clears up a little<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it's you!<sp:5:1:0> How are you holding up
against the heat? Preparation is key!

I wouldn't be able to paint here if not for
all the chilly elixirs I brewed in advance!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>This gets more fascinating the more
I look at it.<sp:5:0:0> It seems that shape holds
some special meaning...<sp:5:1:0>
Hm?
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh>Asleep or awake, <sp:5:1:0>dreams of what might
await on that <clr:0000>tiny island<clr:ffff> occupy my
every thought.
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it's you.<sp:5:0:0> The nights are cruel in this
region...<sp:5:1:0> If you don't light a fire, the cold
will sap your strength away.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>I was so engrossed in my work that
I didn't realize I had a fellow traveler to
converse with.<sp:0:4:0>In case you couldn't tell, I'm a
painter.<sp:5:0:0> I travel the world in search
of beautiful sights.
These mysterious floating islands are only
the most recent to catch my eye.<sp:0:4:0>I was just painting that <clr:0000>small island<clr:ffff> there,
as a matter of fact.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>There's something to that <clr:0000>little
island<clr:ffff>, but what?
Talk_0028:
<snd:Trouble>Granted, you can't see it very well when
the clouds are in the way.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>Ever since the Upheaval, the sky has been
filled with floating islands.<sp:0:4:0>But none has caught my fancy so much
as that exquisitely shaped one there.<sp:0:4:0>I can't quite explain it, but it feels as
though it's speaking to me somehow.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it's you! The morning air is so
refreshing, isn't it?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>Why are the floating islands up there?<sp:5:0:0>
It can't hurt to take a little time out of
your day to stop and think about it.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it's you! There's no better traveling
treat than beautiful scenery. It really
revitalizes your soul.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>What's on that distinctively shaped
island?<sp:5:0:0> My imagination is running wild.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it's you. Starting to get a little dark,
isn't it?
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>That shape really draws my eye...<sp:5:0:0> Do you
think it's a natural formation? Or maybe...<sp:0:4:0>Hm?
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>There must be a reason why that island
has such a particular shape. <sp:5:0:0>Don't
you think?
Talk_0007:
Interested in my painting process,
are you?<sp:0:4:0>I am fascinated by that <clr:0000>small island<clr:ffff> up
there.<sp:5:1:0> I've made it my goal to capture
that distinct shape on canvas.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>That <clr:0000>little island<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> The more I look at it,
the more its shape intrigues me...
Talk_0009_01: <sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sigh>Got to take care not to get wet.
Talk_0011_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I've painted a lot of landscapes in my
time,<sp:5:0:0> but none pique my curiosity like
that <clr:0000>small island<clr:ffff> up there.
Who put that strange little island up
there? <sp:5:1:0>It's a fascinating shape. Easy to
paint too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You should go see it for yourself <clr:0000>once
the weather clears up a little<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0009_02: <sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Understand>Just when I was getting into my painting...
Talk_0012_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, hello. <sp:5:1:0>Always nice to meet a fellow
wanderer out here.<sp:0:4:0>In case you couldn't tell, I'm a painter.<sp:5:0:0>
I travel from place to place, looking for
scenery to inspire me.
Lately, I'm especially taken with the
<clr:0000>floating islands<clr:ffff> that have just appeared
in the sky.
Talk_0015_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>What could be the purpose of that tiny
island floating in the sky?
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Was that island's shape...carved out by
the wind?<sp:5:0:0> Or could it have been... Hmm.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>What if someone with powers beyond our
reckoning sent the island into the sky?<sp:5:1:0>
I daydream about that sometimes.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>When I look up at that island, I get the
sense that someone intended it to be
used for something...
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I feel like I've seen a shape like that
somewhere...<sp:5:0:0> Was it during my travels,
or in a dream?
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh>I can't see that <clr:0000>floating island <clr:ffff>in this
rotten weather...<sp:5:0:0> I might as well rest
until it clears up.
I get it, you're youngâ€”you feel invincible.
But you'll feel much more vincible if you
come down with a cold!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If somebody shaped the island that way...
they must have had a reason, right?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh>The weather is making it impossible to see
that <clr:0000>small island<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I hope it clears up soon.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Does the shape of that island represent
anything, you ask?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>And I would answer...<sp:5:0:0>that it is a flower!<sp:0:4:0>It's my destiny to capture the essence of
this sky flora in paint, I'm sure of it!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>That's the thought that guides my brush
as it dances across the canvas.
Talk_0012: <sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sigh>I guess I'll call it a day.
